original_text: And David went out whithersoever Saul sent him, and behaved himself wisely: and Saul set him over the men of war, and he was accepted in the sight of all the people, and also in the sight of Saul's servants.
korean_text: 다윗은 사울이 보내는 곳마다 가서 지혜롭게 행하매 사울이 그를 군대의 장으로 삼았더니 온 백성이 합당히 여겼고 사울의 신하들도 합당히 여겼더라

sentences.original_text: And David went out whithersoever Saul sent him
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗은 사울이 그를 보낸 곳은 어디든지 나갔고

and he was accepted in the sight of all the people
